name: Post mortem (itch) (paweljarosz)
description:
What will be your memories you'll recall at the end?

You start with nothing, not even your life.
30 seconds after your death you float in the void and can call to mind your memories. 
Best experienced with sound!

Small game made with Defold for Ludum Dare 45.
By Paweł Jarosz

Controls: WSAD or arrows to move, SPACE to dash
Sounds: Me, Julien Nicolas, Bryan Smosh (freesound.org)

Rate it on: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/post-mortem-last-30-sec-lifes-memories

P.S. Check out my other games, especially Witchcrafter ;)
